name: upload
title: Upload a Video
description: Learn how to upload a video to your video library

control_sets.title: Authenticating
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Uploading a Video
control_sets.tip: Use an ```<input type="form">``` tag to upload a video file. Javascript clients should use the [jQuery fileupload plugin](https://github.com/kaltura/jQuery-File-Upload)

control_sets.title: Creating a Media Entry
control_sets.tip: Once the file has been uploaded, use the baseEntry service to create a Media Entry

inputs.label: Name
inputs.tip: Give the file a unique name
inputs.name: name
